name: Click to Hug
description:
Game developed during Game JamOn 2020 featuring the COVID-19 crisis. Play through 3 phases composed by the same 3 minigames but each phase is faster and harder than the previous one, just like these days. Fight for your final hug.

Developed by Alter Ego.
Twitter: @AlterEgoGameDev

 Team members:
Jorge Durán González-Quijano - @jorgedgq99
Javier Estefanía Ramírez 
Juan Carlos García Fernández - @JC4GG
Diego Pérez Izquierdo - @dessketch_
Pablo Rodríguez Álvarez - @Pablo_PBR3
Jorge Sánchez Librero - @Koke232

Thank you so much for playing!
